channel.title: CVE Feed for realmag777 -- WordPress Meta Data Filter & Taxonomies Filter
channel.description: The latest CVEs for realmag777 -- WordPress Meta Data Filter & Taxonomies Filter

item.title: CVE-2021-20781|2024-08-03T17:53:22.558Z -- realmag777 -- wordpress%20meta%20data%20filter%20%26%20taxonomies%20filter
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WordPress Meta Data Filter & Taxonomies Filter versions prior to v.1.2.8 and versions prior to v.2.2.8 allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators via unspecified vectors.
